subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ace Josh Beckett agreed to a four-year, $68 million contract extension that gives Boston the rights to him and fellow starters John Lackey and Jon Lester through 2014.
snippet: Ace Josh Beckett agreed to a four-year, $68 million contract extension that gives Boston the rights to him and fellow starters John Lackey and Jon Lester through 2014.
